summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to several recipients, requesting a call to discuss an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). This document indicates official communication regarding Epstein's status in custody shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

events.title: Prosecutor Requests Call on MCC Incident
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails several individuals to schedule a call regarding an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: On July 24, 2019, a federal prosecutor contacted several individuals regarding an 'incident' involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
The email recipients (Martin Weinber, Marc Femich, and Reid Weingarten) appear to be legal advisors or associates of Epstein.
This communication occurred less than three weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at the MCC on August 10, 2019.
